verses.verse: But <S%H6258>now<s%> they that are <S%H6810>younger<s%> <S%H3117><s%> than I have me in <S%H7832>derision,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H1>fathers<s%> I would have <S%H3988>disdained<s%> to have <S%H7896>set<s%> with the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> of my <S%H6629>flock.<s%>
<S%H1571>Yes,<s%> <S%H4100>whereto<s%> might the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands<s%> profit me, in <S%H5921>whom<s%> old <S%H3624>age<s%> was <S%H6>perished?<s%>

For <S%H2639>want<s%> and <S%H3720>famine<s%> they were <S%H1565>solitary;<s%> <S%H6207>fleeing<s%> into the <S%H6723>wilderness<s%> in <S%H570>former<s%> <S%H570>time<s%> <S%H7722>desolate<s%> and <S%H4875>waste.<s%>
Who <S%H6998>cut<s%> up <S%H4408>mallows<s%> by the <S%H7880>bushes,<s%> and <S%H7574>juniper<s%> <S%H8328>roots<s%> for their <S%H3899>meat.<s%>
They were <S%H1644>driven<s%> forth from <S%H1460>among<s%> men, (they <S%H7321>cried<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> them as after a <S%H1590>thief;<s%>)
To <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6178>cliffs<s%> of the <S%H5158>valleys,<s%> in <S%H2356>caves<s%> of the <S%H6083>earth,<s%> and in the <S%H3710>rocks.<s%>
<S%H996>Among<s%> the <S%H7880>bushes<s%> they <S%H5101>brayed;<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H2738>nettles<s%> they were <S%H5596>gathered<s%> together.

They were <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5036>fools,<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1097>base<s%> <S%H8034><s%> men: they were <S%H5217>viler<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
And <S%H6258>now<s%> am I their <S%H5058>song,<s%> yes, I am their <S%H4405>byword.<s%>
They <S%H8581>abhor<s%> me, they <S%H7368>flee<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> from me, and <S%H2820>spare<s%> not to <S%H7536>spit<s%> in my <S%H6440>face.<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> he has <S%H6605>loosed<s%> my <S%H3499>cord,<s%> and <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> me, they have also let <S%H7971>loose<s%> the <S%H7448>bridle<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me.

On my <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> <S%H6965>rise<s%> the <S%H6526>youth;<s%> they <S%H7971>push<s%> away my <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and they <S%H5549>raise<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> me the <S%H734>ways<s%> of their <S%H343>destruction.<s%>
They <S%H5420>mar<s%> my <S%H5410>path,<s%> they set <S%H3276>forward<s%> my <S%H1942>calamity,<s%> they have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5826>helper.<s%>
They <S%H857>came<s%> on me as a <S%H7342>wide<s%> <S%H6556>breaking<s%> in of waters: in the <S%H7722>desolation<s%> they <S%H1556>rolled<s%> themselves on me.

<S%H1091>Terrors<s%> are <S%H2015>turned<s%> on me: they <S%H7291>pursue<s%> my <S%H5082>soul<s%> as the <S%H7307>wind:<s%> and my <S%H3444>welfare<s%> <S%H5674>passes<s%> away as a <S%H5645>cloud.<s%>
And <S%H6258>now<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H8210>poured<s%> out on me; the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction<s%> have <S%H270>taken<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> on me.
My <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H5365>pierced<s%> in me in the <S%H3915>night<s%> season: and my <S%H6207>sinews<s%> <S%H7901>take<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7901>rest.<s%>

By the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H3581>force<s%> of my disease is my <S%H3830>garment<s%> <S%H2664>changed:<s%> it <S%H247>binds<s%> me <S%H247>about<s%> as the <S%H6310>collar<s%> of my <S%H3801>coat.<s%>
He has <S%H3384>cast<s%> me into the <S%H2563>mire,<s%> and I am <S%H4911>become<s%> <S%H4911>like<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> and <S%H665>ashes.<s%>
I <S%H7768>cry<s%> to you, and you do not <S%H6030>hear<s%> me: I <S%H5975>stand<s%> up, and you <S%H995>regard<s%> me not.
You are <S%H2015>become<s%> <S%H393>cruel<s%> to me: with your <S%H6108>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> you <S%H7852>oppose<s%> yourself against me.
You <S%H5375>lift<s%> me up to the <S%H7307>wind;<s%> you cause me to <S%H7392>ride<s%> on it, and <S%H4127>dissolve<s%> my <S%H7738>substance.<s%>
For I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you will <S%H7725>bring<s%> me to <S%H4194>death,<s%> and to the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4150>appointed<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2416>living.<s%>
However, he will not <S%H7971>stretch<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H1164>grave,<s%> <S%H518>though<s%> they <S%H7769>cry<s%> in his <S%H6365>destruction.<s%>
Did not I <S%H1058>weep<s%> for him that was in <S%H7186>trouble?<s%> was not my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5701>grieved<s%> for the <S%H34>poor?<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> I <S%H6960>looked<s%> for <S%H2896>good,<s%> then <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to me: and when I <S%H3176>waited<s%> for <S%H216>light,<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H652>darkness.<s%>
My <S%H4578>bowels<s%> <S%H7570>boiled,<s%> and <S%H1826>rested<s%> not: the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction<s%> <S%H6923>prevented<s%> me.
I <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6937>mourning<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> the <S%H2535>sun:<s%> I <S%H6965>stood<s%> up, and I <S%H7768>cried<s%> in the <S%H6951>congregation.<s%>
I am a <S%H251>brother<s%> to <S%H8577>dragons,<s%> and a <S%H7453>companion<s%> to <S%H1323>owls.<s%> <S%H3284><s%>
My <S%H5785>skin<s%> is <S%H7835>black<s%> on me, and my <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H2787>burned<s%> with <S%H2721>heat.<s%>
My <S%H3658>harp<s%> also is turned to <S%H60>mourning,<s%> and my <S%H5748>organ<s%> into the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of them that <S%H1058>weep.<s%>
